title: An oration of Ihon Fabritius Montanus VVherby he teacheth that Christian men cannot resorte to the Councel of Trent, without committing an haynous offence. Englyshed by L.A.
author: Fabricius, Joannes, Montanus, 1527-1566.
publicationStmtPublisher: In Powles Churcheyard by [J. Cawood for] Humfrie Toye, dwellynge at the sygne of the Helmet],
